item.description:
Host: Claire P. cell @ 603-247-0897
RAIN CANCELS THIS EVENT!

Weather permitting, I think it would be fun to go hiking on the trails at Beaver Brook in Hollis NH.  Please know that my intent is to enjoy the view of the area, and to chat along the way.  This event is meant more to have fun than to get a workout.   I thought that we would enjoy nature for about two or three hours, with a few breaks/stops along the trail.  This park is just full of beautiful views, so come and enjoy some fresh air, beautiful views, and all this while in good company of friends.

NOTE   !!!THIS IS A NEW MEET LOCATION!!!!We will meet at 11:30 am in the parking lot entrance for Beaver Brook in Hollis NH, located on Route 130, about 1 ½  or 2 miles after we cross Route 122.

FOR YOUR SAFETY:  Please plan on using waterproof boots, microspikes and poles.

DIRECTIONS:  Take exit 6 from Route 3 (Route 130) and go west towards Brookline, stay on Route 130 (approximately 8 ½ miles) and cross Route 122 (Main St), travel about 1 1/2 or 2 miles until you see the entrance to the park.  Look for the meetup sign or my white Toyota Corolla.

Please remember to bring plenty of fluids and to dress in layers so that you will be comfortable the whole time we are out on the trails. 

If anyone cares to, we can then go grab a bite to eat or enjoy a hot chocolate, at small restaurant at the corner of Routes 130 & 122.

This event is at no cost.   I hope to see you there.
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a meetup sign
item.name: Hiking or snowshoeing at Beaver Brook Hollis NH
